trans-unit.source: Passed to custom WSDL exporters and importers to enable customization of the metadata export and import processes for a WSDL endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 传递给自定义 WSDL 导出程序和导入以启用自定义元数据导出和导入 WSDL 终结点的过程。

trans-unit.source: The WsdlEndpointConversionContext class represents the context in which the custom WSDL for an endpoint is either exported using <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension?displayProperty=fullName> or imported using <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: WsdlEndpointConversionContext 类表示的自定义 WSDL 的终结点是可以使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>导入或</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>导出的上下文

trans-unit.source: The following properties enable you to retrieve the WSDL document object model for the current WSDL: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.ContractConversionContext%2A> property gets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext?displayProperty=fullName> for the endpoint contract.
trans-unit.target: 以下属性使你能够检索当前 wsdl 的 WSDL 文档对象模型:-<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.ContractConversionContext%2A>属性可以获取<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext?displayProperty=fullName>终结点协定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.ContractConversionContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.Endpoint%2A> property gets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint?displayProperty=fullName> for the current endpoint.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.Endpoint%2A>属性可以获取<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint?displayProperty=fullName>当前终结点。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.Endpoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.WsdlBinding%2A> property gets the binding for the current endpoint.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.WsdlBinding%2A>属性获取当前终结点的绑定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.WsdlBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.WsdlPort%2A> property gets the port for the current endpoint.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.WsdlPort%2A>属性获取当前终结点的端口。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.WsdlPort%2A>

trans-unit.source: - - The following methods enable you to add or remove custom WSDL elements to the appropriate scopes in the exported or imported WSDL: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultBinding%2A> method returns the fault binding for the specified fault.
trans-unit.target: --以下方法使你能够添加或删除导出或导入的 WSDL 中的自定义 WSDL 元素到适当的作用域:-<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultBinding%2A>方法返回指定错误的错误绑定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultDescription%2A> method returns the fault for the specified fault binding.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultDescription%2A>方法可以返回指定的错误绑定的错误。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultDescription%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetMessageBinding%2A> method returns the message binding for the specified message.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetMessageBinding%2A>方法可以返回指定的消息的消息绑定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetMessageBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetMessageDescription%2A> method returns the message for the specified message binding.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetMessageDescription%2A>方法返回指定的消息绑定的消息。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetMessageDescription%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetOperationBinding%2A> method returns the operation binding for the specified operation.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetOperationBinding%2A>方法可以返回指定的操作的操作绑定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetOperationBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetOperationDescription%2A> method returns the operation for the specified operation binding.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetOperationDescription%2A>方法返回指定的操作绑定的操作。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetOperationDescription%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext"></xref> being exported or imported.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext"></xref>正在被导出或导入。

trans-unit.source: Use the ContractConversionContext to obtain the conversion context of the contract for the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ContractConversionContext 可以获取终结点的协定的转换上下文。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext"></xref> being exported or imported.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext"> </xref>正在被导出或导入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> being exported or imported.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>正在被导出或导入。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: Use the Endpoint property to obtain the service endpoint description on export or import.
trans-unit.target: 终结点属性用于获取服务终结点说明导出或导入。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> being exported or imported.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>正在被导出或导入。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: Gets the WSDL binding associated with the fault.
trans-unit.target: 获取与错误关联的 WSDL 绑定。

trans-unit.source: This method is the inverse of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultDescription%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是函数的反函数<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultDescription%2A>方法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultDescription%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription> for the fault associated with the WSDL binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription>与 WSDL 绑定关联的错误。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription>

trans-unit.source: The WSDL <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBinding"></xref> associated with the fault.
trans-unit.target: WSDL <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBinding"> </xref>与错误关联。

trans-unit.source: Gets the description for the fault associated with the WSDL fault binding.
trans-unit.target: 获取与 WSDL 错误绑定关联的错误的说明。

trans-unit.source: This method is the inverse of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultBinding%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是函数的反函数<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultBinding%2A>方法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetFaultBinding%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.FaultBinding"> </xref>与 WSDL 错误绑定关联。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription> for the fault associated with the WSDL binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription>与 WSDL 绑定关联的错误。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription>

trans-unit.source: Gets the WSDL binding for the message specified by the description.
trans-unit.target: 获取由该说明指定的消息的 WSDL 绑定。

trans-unit.source: This method is the inverse of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetMessageDescription%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是函数的反函数<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetMessageDescription%2A>方法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetMessageDescription%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription>与说明关联。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"></xref> for the message specified by the description.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding"> </xref>由该说明指定的消息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the message description for the message specified by the WSDL binding.
trans-unit.target: 获取由 WSDL 绑定指定的消息的消息说明。

trans-unit.source: This method is the inverse of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetMessageBinding%2A> method.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription>指定由绑定的消息。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription>

trans-unit.source: Gets the WSDL binding for the operation specified by the description.
trans-unit.target: 获取由该说明指定的操作的 WSDL 绑定。

trans-unit.source: This method is the inverse of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetOperationDescription%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是函数的反函数<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetOperationDescription%2A>方法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext.GetOperationDescription%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns the operation description of the operation associated with the WSDL binding.
trans-unit.target: 返回与 WSDL 绑定关联的操作的操作说明。
